price: Nkuruwa (a nsa pa) a εmma ahuhusεm anaa εmfa bͻne mma befri woi hͻ akͻ woi hͻ.
arabic: يَتَنَٰزَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأۡسٗا لَّا لَغۡوٞ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأۡثِيمٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: yatanāzaʿūna fīhā kasan lā laghwun fīhā walā tathīmun
translations: They will pass to one another
